# docker_org_member (Resource)

Manages Docker Hub organization members.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_name` (String) The Docker Hub organization name.
- `username` (String) The username to add to the organization.

### Optional

- `role` (String) The role of the member in the organization. Valid values: member, owner. Default: member.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource (org_name/username).
